title: The Fire Star
description: A maid with a plan.A squire with a secret.A missing jewel.A kingdom in turmoil.Maven and Reeve have three days to solve the mystery of the Fire Star. If they don’t, they’ll lose everything.This could be a complete disaster . . . or the beginning of a great friendship.39 Clues meets Ranger’s Apprentice in bestselling fantasy author A. L. Tait's new medieval adventure series about two unlikely friends – and a mystery to solve that could change their lives.
author: A.L. Tait
